intro: Ixora foliosa, commonly known as the leafy ixora, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many ornamental and medicinal plants. The plant is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and clusters of small, bright red flowers that bloom throughout the year. Ixora foliosa typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its flowers are often used in floral arrangements due to their vibrant color and long-lasting nature.
